name: Megethos
description:
You have fallen down into a hole with no means of escape. An entrance to some sort of dungeon? Might as well explore...

Grow and shrink your way through the dungeon, discovering hidden passageways and broken down tunnels. You may even find some treasure along the way.

(Made for the GoGodot Game Jam 2021 | Theme: Growth)

Update 2021/6/2: Due to an issue with Chrome-based browsers, the web build has been disabled. We would rather have people be able to play the game as intended than play a possibly broken version. Please download one of the native builds for your platform below!

Update 2021/6/3: An issue which prevented the macOS build from running has been fixed.
